dcterms:creator: Qian Wang
Zhen Zhang
Zemin Liu
Shengliang Lu
Bingqiao Luo
Bingsheng He
dcterms:description: EX-Graph is a pioneering dataset that bridges Ethereum transaction records and X following data, combining 2 million Ethereum nodes and 30 million edges with 1 million X nodes and 3 million edges, including 30,667 verified matching links between Ethereum addresses and X accounts.
dcterms:title: EX-Graph

dcterms:creator: K. Shamsi
F. Victor
M. Kantarcioglu
Y. Gel
C. G. Akcora
dcterms:description: Chartalist is a labeled graph dataset designed for machine learning tasks on blockchains, specifically focusing on UTXO and account-based blockchains.
dcterms:title: Chartalist

dcterms:creator: F. Béres
I. A. Seres
A. A. Benczúr
M. Quintyne-Collins
dcterms:description: This dataset profiles and deanonymizes Ethereum users, providing insights into user behavior and transaction patterns.
dcterms:title: Dataset from Béres et al. (2021)

dcterms:creator: K. Vasan
M. Janosov
A.-L. Barabási
dcterms:description: This dataset quantifies NFT-driven networks in the crypto art space, providing insights into the relationships and interactions among NFT artists.
dcterms:title: Dataset from Vasan et al. (2022)

dcterms:creator: F. Béres
I. A. Seres
A. A. Benczúr
M. Quintyne-Collins
dcterms:description: This dataset contains records of wash-trading transactions collected from Dune, providing insights into fraudulent trading activities on Ethereum.
dcterms:title: Dataset from Dune
